Marked






  • âš¡ built for speed
  • â¬‡ï¸ low-level compiler for parsing markdown without caching or blocking for long periods of time
  • âš–ï¸ light-weight while implementing all markdown features from the supported flavors & specifications
  • ğŸŒ works in a browser, on a server, or from a command line interface (CLI)

Demo

Checkout the demo page to see marked in action â›¹ï¸

Docs

Our documentation pages are also rendered using marked ğŸ’¯

Also read about:

  • Options
  • Extensibility

Compatibility

Node.js: Only current and LTS Node.js versions are supported. End of life Node.js versions may become incompatible with Marked at any point in time.

Browser: Not IE11 :)

Warning: ğŸš¨ Marked does not sanitize the output HTML. Please use a sanitize library, like DOMPurify (recommended), sanitize-html or insane on the output HTML! ğŸš¨
